website_summaries.verdict: A good value case to choose for Microsoft Surface laptops that offers a basic level of protection.
pros: Easy to attach to most current Surface laptop models
Comes in 2 distinct colors to match personal preference
Includes a separate attachment point for the Surface Pen to keep it with the laptop
cons: Laptop cover can have a loose fit over the straps when transporting a Surface around in a bag or backpack

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy on back side
customer_reviews.text: The leather case seems really nice but the back side or section where it covers the back of the screen is TOO heavy. When using laptop and i move it around it slips backward slowly. The hinges on mu surface laptop are really tight so that would not be the problem. Anyway. I will keep using it but will try not to move the laptop around as much, though that would prove to be impossible sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit my surface laptop. The top portion which holds the screen is too tight, the small edges meant to hold it in place broke apart from the back while I wad putting it on and it still doesn't fit. Also the top edge completely covers the power and volume buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits a little big
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Microsoft Surface. Although it fits a little big for my Surface(13.5"), I am not complaining. I think it is a pretty good quality cover and my main purpose for the purchase was so that my slick Surface wouldn't slide everywhere. Overall, its a good cover.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Looks like quality at a low price!
customer_reviews.text: The first flawless application of a screen cover yet! For $12.99 this matches my leather portfolio and mouse mat. Looks pretty good and the price is even better.
